section_1.headline: If only they could see the way you care.
section_1.subtext: CareStory shows what was said, how it felt, and how it made a difference.

section_2.headline: Care is more than just numbers.
subtext: By the time I finish my shift and sit down to chart, I can barely remember what happened.
This is what it means to document care today
CareStory creates a living record — captured in real time, grounded in signals, and ready to support the people who make care possible

section_3.headline: CareStory creates a reviewable living record of what was seen, heard, and felt.
subtext: So when it comes time to document, you're not relying on memory. You're returning to the moment—with confidence and clarity.
